nio/Debounce.description: The Debounce block will filter out signals for [interval] seconds after a signal flows through the block.

group_by.title: Group By
group_by.description: Signal attribute to define groupings of incoming signals.

interval.title: Debounce Interval
interval.description: Amount of time to wait before allowing another signal in a matching group.

default.description: The first signal for each group, every interval.
